snippet: Rory McIlroy finished at seven-over 291 before pounding rain led to two lengthy suspensions at the BMW Championship, setting up a Monday finish.
abstract: Rain leads to two lengthy suspensions at BMW Championship golf tournament, with Rory McIlroy leading six golfers who finished final-round play, but several others still to finish.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy finished at seven-over 291 before pounding rain led to two lengthy suspensions at the BMW Championship, setting up a Monday finish.

headline.main: McIlroy’s Season, Full of Swings in Fortune, Ends on a Rainy and Positive Note
headline.print_headline: McIlroy’s Season, Full of Swings in Fortune, Ends on a Rainy and Positive Note
